help.slash_desc: Find out what the commands do
help.description:
If no command is given or given command is not valid, sends a list of commands.
 If given command is valid, sends a description, usage and a usage example of the command, like this page.

ping.short_desc: Sends latency and some info about the bot and server
ping.slash_desc: Find out Chaotic's latency and uptime, and some stats about the server
ping.description: Sends the latency and uptime of the bot, as well as some server stuff.

code.short_desc: Sends a link to the GitHub repository
code.description: Sends a link to Chaotic's GitHub repository.

prime.short_desc: Checks if a number is a prime number
prime.slash_desc: Find out if a number is a prime number
prime.description: Checks if a number is a prime number, or just a boring normal number.

convert.description: Converts metric units, because imperial units were too complicated for me to program.

rng.description: Generates a random number from `minimum` to `maximum`.

char.description: Counts the characters in an argument.
char.example: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
